channel.title: Paragraph Game
channel.description:
I put this in this section instead of the gneral seciton because i know it owuld just become a spam fest. Hopefull here it will actaully work out.
This is the game where you have to continue a story by adding on a PARAGRAPH. not a sentance. The story may not be ended. and i define a paragraph as at least 4 sentances so at least 4 sentances and then start the next sentance
no one but me can end it.
also always start and end your post with: ...... ( unles you are starting or ending the story)
I will start:
The year is 2197. There is a super computer. But this super computer was so super it was begining to develop artificail inteligence. It lived in a building hidden form the public so secret government researchers could use it to moniter people.On day Jack A. was walking home from work and.......
